10.verse: [B] . . . . jah guþ, hvaiwa weihaba jah garaihtaba jah unfairinodaba izwis þaim galaubjandam wesum,

11.verse: [B] swaswe wituþ ainhvarjanoh izwara, swe atta barna seina, bidjandans izwis jah gaþlaihandans,

12.verse: [B] jah weitwodjandans du gaggan izwis wairþaba gudis, saei laþoda izwis du seinai þiudangardjai jah wulþau.

13.verse: [B] duþe jah weis awiliudom guda unsweibandans, unte nimandans at uns waurd hauseinais gudis andnemuþ ni swaswe waurd manne, ak swaswe ist sunjaba waurd gudis, þatei jah waurkei<þ> in izwis juzei galaubeiþ.

14.verse: [B] jus auk galeikondans waurþuþ, broþrjus, aikklesjom gudis þaim wisandeim in Iudaia in Xristau Iesu, unte þata samo wunnuþ jah jus fram izwaraim inkunjam swaswe jah weis fram Iudaium,

15.verse: [B] þaiei jah fraujin usqemun Iesua jah swesaim praufetum jah uns frawrekun jah guda ni galeikandans jah allaim mannam andaneiþans sind,

16.verse: [B] warjandans uns du þiudom rodjan ei ganisaina, akei du usfulljan seinos frawaurhtins sinteino; aþþan snauh ana ins hatis gudis und andi.

17.verse: [B] aþþan weis, broþrjus, gaain[an]aidai af izwis du mela hveilos, andwairþja ni hairtin, ufarassau sniumidedum andaugi izwar[a] gasaihvan in managamma lustau.

18.verse: [B] unte wildedum qiman at izwis, ik raihtis Pawlus jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim, jah analatida uns Satana.

19.verse: [B] hva auk ist unsara wens aiþþau faheþs aiþþau waips hvoftuljos, niu jus in andwairþja fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus in is quma?

20.verse: [B] jus auk siuþ wulþus unsar jah faheþs.

1.verse: [B] In þizei ju ni usþulandans þanamais, galeikaida uns ei biliþanai weseima in Aþeinim ainai.

2.verse: [B] jah insandidedum Teimauþaiu, broþar unsarana jah andbaht gudis in aiwaggeljon Xristaus, ei izwis gatulgjai jah bidjai bi galaubein izwara,

3.verse: [B] ei ni ainshun afagjaidau in þaim aggwiþom; silbans auk wituþ þatei du þamma satidai sijum.

4.verse: [B] jah auk þan wesum at izwis, fauraqeþum izwis þatei anawairþ was uns du winnan agliþos, swaswe jah warþ jah wituþ.

5.verse: [B] duþþe jah ik ju ni usþulan<d>s insandida du ufkunnan galaubein izwara, ibai aufto usfaifraisi izwis sa fraisands jah sware wairþai arbaiþs unsara.

6.verse: [B] aþþan nu at qimandin Teimauþaiu at unsis fram izwis jah gateihandin uns galaubein <jah> friaþwa izwara, jah þatei gaminþi unsar habaiþ god sinteino, gairnjandans uns gasaihvan, swaswe jah weis izwis,

7.verse: [B] inuh þis gaþrafstidai sijum, broþrjus, fram izwis ana allai nauþai jah aglon unsarai in izwaraizos galaubeinais;

8.verse: [B] unte sai libam, jabai jus gastandiþ in fraujin.

9.verse: [B] hva auk awiliude magum usgildan [fraujin] guda bi izwis ana allai fahedai þizaiei faginom in izwara faura guda unsaramma,

10.verse: [B] naht jah daga ufarassau bidjandans ei gasaihvaima andwairþja izwara jah ustiuhaima waninassu galaubeinais izwaraizos?

11.verse: [B] aþþan silba guþ jah atta unsar jah frauja unsar Iesus Xristus garaihtjai wig unsarana du izwis.

12.verse: [B] aþþan izwis frauja managjai jah ganohnan gataujai friaþwai in izwis misso jah allans swaswe jah weis in izwis,

13.verse: [B] du tulgjan hairtona izwara u(n)fairinona in weihiþai faura guda jah attin unsaramma in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus miþ allaim þaim weiham seinaim.

1.verse: [B] Þannu nu, broþrjus, anahaitam bidai izwis jah bidjam in fraujin Iesua, ei swaswe andnemuþ at uns hvaiwa skuluþ gaggan jah galeikan guda, swa[swe] jah gaggaiþ jah gaaukaiþ mais.

2.verse: [B] wituþ auk hvarjos anabusnins atgebum izwis þairh fraujan Iesu Xristu.

3.verse: [B] þata auk ist wilja gudis, weihiþa izwara, ei gahabaiþ izwis af kalkinassau[s],

4.verse: [B] ei witi hvarjizuh izwara gastaldan sein kas in weihiþai jah sweriþai,

5.verse: [B] ni in gairunja lustaus, swaswe jah þiudos þozei ni kunnun guþ,

6.verse: [B] ei hvas ni ufargaggai nih bi faihu _ol_ broþar seinana, unte fraweitands frauja ist allaize, swaswe jah fauraqeþum izwis jah weitwodidedum.

7.verse: [B] unte ni laþoda uns guþ du unhrainiþai, ak in weihiþa.

8.verse: [B] inuh þis nu saei ufbrikiþ, ni mann ufbrikiþ, ak guda, saei gaf ahman seinana weihana izwis.

9.verse: [B] aþþan bi broþrulubon ni þaurbum meljan izwis, unte silbans jus at guda uslaisidai sijuþ du frijon izwis misso.

10.verse: [B] jah auk taujiþ þata in allans broþruns in allai Makidonai; aþþan bidjam izwis, broþrjus, biauknan mais

11.verse: [B] jah biarbaidjan anaqal jah taujan swesa jah waurkjan handum izwaraim, swaswe jah izwis anabudum,

12.verse: [B] ei gaggaiþ gafehaba du þaim þaiei uta sind jah ni ainishun hvis þaurbeiþ.

13.verse: [B] aþþan ni wileima izwis unweisans, broþrjus, bi þans anaslepandans, ei ni saurgaiþ swe þai anþarai þaiei ni haband wen.

14.verse: [B] unte jabai galaubjam þatei Iesus gaswalt jah usstoþ, swa jah guþ þans þaiei anasaislepun þairh Iesu tiuh[a]iþ miþ imma.

15.verse: [B] þatuþ~þan izwis qiþam in waurda fraujins, þatei weis þai libandans, þai bilaibidans in quma fraujins ni bisniwam faur þans anaslepandans;

16.verse: [B] unte silba frauja in haitjai, in stibnai arkaggilaus jah in þuthaurna gudis dalaþ atsteigiþ af himina jah dauþans þai in Xristau usstandand faurþis.

17.verse: [B] þaþro þan weis þai libandans, þai aflifnandans suns miþ imma frawilwanda in milhmam du gamotjan fraujin in luftau jah <swa> framwigis miþ fraujin wairþam.

18.verse: [B] swaei nu þrafsteiþ izwis misso in þaim waurdam.

1.verse: [B] Aþþan bi þo þeihsa jah mela, broþrjus, ni þaurbum ei izwis meljaima;

2.verse: [B] unte silbans glaggwo wituþ þatei dags fraujins swe þiubs in naht swa qimiþ.

3.verse: [B] þan qiþand: gawairþi jah tulgiþa, þanuh unweniggo ins biqimiþ fralusts swaswe sair qiþuhafton, jah ni unþaþliuhand.

4.verse: [B] aþþan jus, broþrjus, ni sijuþ in riqiza, ei sa dags izwis swe þiubs gafahai;

5.verse: [B] unte allai jus sunjus liuhadis sijuþ jah sunjus dagis; ni siuþ nahts ni riqizis.

6.verse: [B] þannu nu ni slepaima swe þai anþarai, ak wakaima jah warai sijaima;

7.verse: [B] unte þaiei slepand, naht slepand, jah þaiei drugkanai wairþand, nahts drugkanai wairþand.

8.verse: [B] iþ weis dagis wisandans usskawai sijaima, gahamodai brunjon galaubeinais jah friaþwos jah hilma wenai nas[s]einais.

9.verse: [B] unte ni satida uns guþ in hatis, ak du gafreideinai ganistais, þairh fraujan unsarana Iesu Xristu,

10.verse: [B] saei gaswalt faur uns, ei, jaþþe slepaima jaþþe wakaima, samana miþ imma libaima.

11.verse: [B] inuh þis þrafsteiþ izwis misso jah timrjaiþ ainhvarjizuh anþar anþarana, swaswe jah taujiþ.

12.verse: [B] aþþan bidjam izwis, broþrjus, kunnan þans arbaidjandans in izwis jah faurstassjans izwarans in fraujin <jah talzjandans izwis>

13.verse: [B] <jah> sweraiþ ins ufarassau in friaþwai in waurstwis ize jah gawairþi habaiþ in izwis.

14.verse: [B] bidjamuþ~þan izwis, broþrjus, talzjaiþ þans ungatassans, þrafstjaiþ þans grindafraþjans, usþulaiþ þans siukans, usbeisneigai sijaiþ wiþra allans.

15.verse: [B] saihviþ ibai hvas ubil und ubilamma hvamma usgildai, ak sinteino þiuþ laistjaiþ miþ izwis misso jah wiþra allans.

18.verse: [B] in allamma awili(udoþ). þata auk ist wilja gudis in Xristau Iesu in izwis.

21.verse: [B] aþþan all uskiusaiþ; þatei god sijai, gahabaiþ.

22.verse: [B] af allamma waihte ubilaizo afhabaiþ izwis.

23.verse: [B] aþþan silba guþ gawairþjis gaweihai izwis allandjo jah gahailana izwarana ahman, jah saiwala jah leik usfairinona in quma fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus gafastaindau.

24.verse: [B] triggws saei laþoda izwis, saei jah taujiþ.

26.verse: [B] goljaiþ broþruns allans in gafrijonai weihai.

27.verse: [B] biswara izwis in fraujin ei ussiggwaidau so aipistaule þaim weiham broþrum.
